marketing_campaign.description: Details about different marketing campaign on customer on different products

schema.AcceptedCmp1: 1 if customer accepted the offer in the 1st campaign, 0 otherwise
schema.AcceptedCmp2: 1 if customer accepted the offer in the 2nd campaign, 0 otherwise
schema.AcceptedCmp3: 1 if customer accepted the offer in the 3rd campaign, 0 otherwise
schema.AcceptedCmp4: 1 if customer accepted the offer in the 4th campaign, 0 otherwise
schema.AcceptedCmp5: 1 if customer accepted the offer in the 5th campaign, 0 otherwise
schema.Response: 1 if customer accepted the offer in the last campaign, 0 otherwise
schema.Complain: 1 if customer complained in the last 2 years
schema.DtCustomer: date of customer's enrolment with the company
schema.Kidhome: number of small children in customer's household
schema.Teenhome: number of teenagers in customer's household
schema.MntFishProducts: amount spent on fish products in the last 2 years
schema.MntMeatProducts: amount spent on meat products in the last 2 years
schema.MntFruits: amount spent on fruits products in the last 2 years
schema.MntSweetProducts: amount spent on sweet products in the last 2 years
schema.MntWines: amount spent on wine products in the last 2 years
schema.MntGoldProds: amount spent on gold products in the last 2 years
schema.NumDealsPurchases: number of purchases made with discount
schema.NumCatalogPurchases: number of purchases made using catalogue
schema.NumStorePurchases: number of purchases made directly in stores
schema.NumWebPurchases: number of purchases made through company's web site
schema.NumWebVisitsMonth: number of visits to company's web site in the last month
schema.Recency: number of days since the last purchase
